parameters.name: Category
parameters.description:
The type of the tag. Valid values:

*   **Custom**: The tag is added by a user.
*   **System**: The tag is added by the system.

>  By default, if the parameter is left empty, custom tags and system tags are returned.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1. This parameter is used together with PageSize.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of tags to return on each page if the DTS instance has multiple tags. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the DTS instance. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking instance. You can call the [DescribeDtsJobs](~~209702~~) operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to **ALIYUN::DTS::INSTANCE**.
